Title: Intransigence
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Hallie Lambert (written for television by), Hallie Lambert (staff writer)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: The Rocinante seeks a new game plan as they attempt to avoid capture; Melba's true motives are revealed; Naomi is torn between identity and ideal; Anna seeks a way to stay aboard the Thomas Prince.
